db

Class DataAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • db.DataAccess

  • public class DataAccess
extends java.lang.Object
     The DataAccess class is implemented as a singleton.
 This class stores the database as Java objects in memory and stores any changes to the database file for database persistence.
 Any changes to the database happen through this classes public methods.
 These methods should only be called my the Service classes.
